title: Nobu
details: The only Nobu in Africa. Embark on an unforgettable journey of gourmet excellence, fresh creations and masterful Japanese-Peruvian cuisine with Nobu Cape Town.

title: Best of Asia
details: We are well known for our great value for money and extremely reasonable fresh sushi specials with excellent service.

title: Willoughby & Co.
details: Willoughby & Co offers its clientele a full Japanese kitchen, ranging from the freshest sushi to tempura dishes, oyster shooters to soups and salads.

title: NURI SUSHI
details: Inspired by the Traditional Craftsmanship of Japan, We Offer Great Quality Sushi at an Affordable Price. Delicious Seafood, Classic to Gourmet Sushi.
